name: Ying & Yang: The Two Sides of The Forest
name_original: Ying & Yang: The Two Sides of The Forest
description:
Game for Brackeys 2021.1 GameJam.

Theme: Stronger Together

A short adventure with only one level. We found the idea and mechanics interesting, a pity that due to technical problems, we were unable to explore it further.

All of the assets were made by us.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Hold Space - Float

L - Dash

Q - Split and Join

K - Trade Forms

Tip - to enter the portal, come closer to the other form and join by pressing Q.

Lucca Menegon - 3D Artist

Victor Valdo - Programmer
